ai.summary: A 13.7 km moderate section of the London LOOP in the UK, Section 20. This hike combines woodland trails, grassy fields, and occasional light urban paths, offering a solid day of walking without committing to a full-loop trek.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly well-defined trails with a mix of forest tracks, grassy paths, and occasional road crossings. Elevation gain is moderate with gentle climbs; expect uneven surfaces and some exposed roots.
ai.safety_notes: Plan for a 13.7 km day; check weather and daylight hours; wear sturdy footwear with good grip; bring a map or GPS; stay on marked paths and be cautious at road crossings in urban sections; carry sufficient water (at least 2 litres) and snacks; apply sun protection in sunny conditions; bring a lightweight layer and a waterproof jacket; tell someone your route and expected return; consider a headlamp if finishing after dark; carry a small first-aid kit and a whistle for emergencies.
recommended_gear: Map and compass or GPS device
ai.best_seasons: Spring to Autumn; winter hikes are possible with proper planning and daylight consideration.

seo.title: London LOOP Section 20 – 13.7 km Moderate Hike (UK)
seo.meta_description: Discover Section 20 of the London LOOP in the UK. A 13.7 km moderate hike through woodland, fields, and light urban paths. Safety tips and gear included.
